name: Idle Crypto Tycoon
description:
Crypto Tycoon is a minimalistic mobile simulation and management game that will take players on an exciting journey to become a Crypto Tycoon while challenging them with variety of casual tap games.

Players can mine different virtual coins clicking, tapping or with idle miner games. Invest them in trade market and even build and upgrade your Blockchain in any way you want, focusing on one specific crypto or many others at the same time. Automate your workflow by hiring managers and make your Blockchain self-sustained even while you`re away.

Whit its simple minimalist design and atmosphere, this clicker game will have you hooked and keep you coming for more as your micro Blockchain empire grows. Steel your nerves, ready your reflexes for this challenge and you are ready to become crypto tycoon billionaire!

- Tap Miner game has simple goal to tap the screen and reduce time for next block. For each solved block player will be reworded current cryptocurrencies that he is mining. By selling coins via wallet for dollars $ he can upgrade miners that reduce number of taps for next block and increase reward of next one.
- Trader game has simple goal have fun and increase percent of coins that you own. By playing game goal is to tap screen when candle stick enters the marker on the screen if you tap to early or to late you lose % of your coins. As long as you are in positive % you will progress to next level.

Players will not earn any real crypto currencies inside of the game or will be paid out, crypto's in game are virtual and we design our own way of mining and trading through game which has nothing to do with real mining trading or investing.
